Custom MATLAB functions written by the author are included in this directory (SWOT_CalVal_StructureFunctions/dependencies/).

Other dependencies which are not included in core MATLAB R2024a, not included in a native MATLAB package, and not written by the author but required to run other scripts are as follows:

For calculating density from T,S,P:
https://www.teos-10.org/software.htm

For making maps:
https://www-old.eoas.ubc.ca/~rich/map.html
